Others: The Cavaliers are on a 9-game winning streak, having won all games by double digits.
The Cavaliers are 17-1 at home, with their only loss being to the Atlanta Hawks on Nov 27.
The Hornets are 7-26 and have lost 9 straight games.
The Cavaliers will host the Charlotte Hornets at 6 p.m. on Jan 5 at Rocket Mortgage FieldHouse.
The Cavaliers are expected to continue their winning streak against the struggling Hornets.
